Each employee has a {attritionRate}% cha: Each employee has a {attritionRate}% chance of quitting each year.
Female scores are randomly selected from: Female scores are randomly selected from the range [0, 100]
Impact of bias on an organization: Impact of bias on an organization
Male scores are randomly selected from t: Male scores are randomly selected from the range [{bias}, {0}]
The Employees column gives the number of: The Employees column gives the number of people at each level of the organization (so at the top is the CEO).
The lowest level workers are randomly as: The lowest level workers are randomly assigned a gender and a score.
Vacancies are filled by promoting the to: Vacancies are filled by promoting the top scoring worker from the previous level.
